Seedream4.description: Seedream 4.0 image generation node, supporting both text-to-image and multi-image input generation.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for image generation, supports both Chinese and English.

image_size.name: Image Size
image_size.tooltip: Output image aspect ratio. You can choose preset ratios, follow reference image, or custom sizes. When 4K resolution is enabled, preset ratios will use higher resolutions.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Since Seedream 4.0 does not support random seeds, this option is mainly used to control whether to regenerate images with the same parameters. When all parameters (including seed) are the same, cached results will be returned directly without re-requesting the API. Value range is [-1, 2147483647], default value is -1.

num_images.name: Number of Images
num_images.tooltip: Number of images to generate, range 1-6.

max_images.name: Max Images
max_images.tooltip: Maximum number of images to generate, range 1-6.

image_1.name: Reference Image 1
image_1.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_2.name: Reference Image 2
image_2.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_3.name: Reference Image 3
image_3.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_4.name: Reference Image 4
image_4.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_5.name: Reference Image 5
image_5.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_6.name: Reference Image 6
image_6.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_7.name: Reference Image 7
image_7.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_8.name: Reference Image 8
image_8.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_9.name: Reference Image 9
image_9.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_10.name: Reference Image 10
image_10.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

sequential_image_generation.name: Sequential Image Generation
sequential_image_generation.tooltip: Whether to enable sequential image generation. When enabled, multiple related images can be generated.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: Access key for Seedream API. If not provided, the key from the configuration file will be used.

enable_4k.name: Enable 4K Resolution
enable_4k.tooltip: Whether to enable 4K resolution output. This option is invalid when image size is set to custom.

Seedream4Fal.description: Seedream 4.0 (fal) image generation node based on fal interface, supporting text-to-image and image editing features with automatic interface switching.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for image generation, supports both Chinese and English.

image_size.name: Image Size
image_size.tooltip: Output image aspect ratio. You can choose preset ratios or custom sizes.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Controls the randomness of image generation. Set to -1 for random generation. Value range is [-1, 2147483647], default value is -1.

num_images.name: Number of Images
num_images.tooltip: Number of images to generate, range 1-4.

max_images.name: Max Images
max_images.tooltip: Maximum number of images to generate, range 1-4.

image.name: Input Image
image.tooltip: Optional input image for image editing. If provided, will automatically switch to image editing mode.

image_1.name: Reference Image 1
image_1.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_2.name: Reference Image 2
image_2.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_3.name: Reference Image 3
image_3.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_4.name: Reference Image 4
image_4.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_5.name: Reference Image 5
image_5.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_6.name: Reference Image 6
image_6.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_7.name: Reference Image 7
image_7.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_8.name: Reference Image 8
image_8.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_9.name: Reference Image 9
image_9.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

image_10.name: Reference Image 10
image_10.tooltip: Optional reference image for image-to-image generation.

strength.name: Strength
strength.tooltip: Strength of image editing, range 0-1. Higher values result in more significant changes to the original image. Only effective when an input image is provided.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: Access key for FAL API. If not provided, the key from the configuration file or environment variable FAL_API_KEY will be used.

enable_4k.name: Enable 4K Resolution
enable_4k.tooltip: Whether to enable 4K resolution output. This option is invalid when image size is set to custom.

enable_safety_checker.name: Enable Safety Checker
enable_safety_checker.tooltip: Whether to enable content safety checking. When enabled, some sensitive content may be filtered out.

sync_mode.name: Sync Mode
sync_mode.tooltip: Whether to use synchronous mode for API calls. Synchronous mode waits for the API to complete before returning results, while asynchronous mode returns a task ID immediately.

MiniMaxTTS.description: MiniMax text-to-speech node supporting multiple languages and voices, converts text into natural and fluent speech.

text.name: Text
text.tooltip: Text content to synthesize, supports multilingual mixed input. Maximum input is 10000 characters.

voice.name: Voice
voice.tooltip: Select the voice for speech synthesis, supporting various voices in different languages.

model.name: Model
model.tooltip: Select the speech synthesis model, different models have differences in quality and speed.

voice_id.name: Voice ID
voice_id.tooltip: Voice ID input port. When connected, the 'Voice' selector selection will be ignored.

speed.name: Speed
speed.tooltip: Adjust speech playback speed, range 0.5-2.0, default value is 1.0.

vol.name: Volume
vol.tooltip: Adjust speech volume, range 0.1-10.0, default value is 1.0.

pitch.name: Pitch
pitch.tooltip: Adjust speech pitch, range -12 to 12, default value is 0.

emotion.name: Emotion
emotion.tooltip: Select speech emotion, affects the emotional expression of the voice.

text_normalization.name: Text Normalization
text_normalization.tooltip: Whether to normalize text, such as conversion of numbers, dates, etc.

sample_rate.name: Sample Rate
sample_rate.tooltip: Select audio sample rate, affects audio quality and file size.

bitrate.name: Bitrate
bitrate.tooltip: Select audio bitrate, only valid for MP3 format, affects audio quality and file size.

channel.name: Channel
channel.tooltip: Select audio channel count, 1 for mono, 2 for stereo.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: MiniMax API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

MiniMaxVoiceSelector.description: MiniMax voice selector node, fetches available voices from API and allows user to select voice by name, outputs corresponding voice ID.

voice_name.name: Voice Name
voice_name.tooltip: Select voice name from the dropdown list. Click 'Refresh Voice List' button to update the list.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: MiniMax API access key. Required to refresh voice list.

voice_type.name: Voice Type
voice_type.tooltip: Select voice type to filter. 'all' for all voices, 'system' for system voices, 'voice_cloning' for cloned voices, 'voice_generation' for generated voices.

MiniMaxVoiceClone.description: MiniMax voice clone node, clones voice by uploading audio files, and optionally provides sample audio to enhance cloning effect.

clone_audio.name: Clone Audio
clone_audio.tooltip: Audio file to be cloned, supports mp3, m4a, wav formats, duration should be at least 10 seconds and no more than 5 minutes.

voice_id.name: Voice ID
voice_id.tooltip: Custom cloned voice ID, length 8-256, first character must be an English letter, allows numbers, letters, -, _, last character cannot be - or _.

prompt_audio.name: Prompt Audio
prompt_audio.tooltip: Optional sample audio file to enhance voice similarity and stability, supports mp3, m4a, wav formats, duration should be less than 8 seconds.

prompt_text.name: Prompt Text
prompt_text.tooltip: Text corresponding to the prompt audio, must match the audio content, and should end with punctuation.

test_text.name: Test Text
test_text.tooltip: Voice cloning test parameter, the model will read this text using the cloned voice.

model.name: Model
model.tooltip: Specify the speech model used to synthesize the test audio.

need_noise_reduction.name: Noise Reduction
need_noise_reduction.tooltip: Voice cloning parameter, whether to enable noise reduction.

need_volume_normalization.name: Volume Normalization
need_volume_normalization.tooltip: Voice cloning parameter, whether to enable volume normalization.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: MiniMax API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

0.name: Demo Audio
0.tooltip: Test audio synthesized using the cloned voice.

RandomStringNode.description: Generates random strings based on specified rules. Each execution produces a different random string.

指定长度.name: Specified Length
指定长度.tooltip: Specified length. When set to 0, min/max length is used. When set to positive integer, min/max length is ignored. Minimum value is 1.

最小长度.name: Min Length
最小长度.tooltip: Minimum length of generated string. Default is 8.

最大长度.name: Max Length
最大长度.tooltip: Maximum length of generated string. Default is 256.

生成指定内容.name: Specified Content
生成指定内容.tooltip: Custom content to be included in the result. Characters are split by whitespace. When empty, no specified content is included.

生成数字.name: Generate Numbers
生成数字.tooltip: Whether to include numbers in the generated string. Default is on.

生成大写字母.name: Generate Uppercase Letters
生成大写字母.tooltip: Whether to include uppercase letters in the generated string. Default is on.

生成小写字母.name: Generate Lowercase Letters
生成小写字母.tooltip: Whether to include lowercase letters in the generated string. Default is on.

首字母为英文.name: First Character as English
首字母为英文.tooltip: Whether the first character should be an English letter. Default is on.

末尾不生成指定内容.name: Exclude Specified Content at End
末尾不生成指定内容.tooltip: Whether to exclude specified content at the end of the string. Default is on.

DoubaoTTS.description: Doubao text-to-speech node based on Volcano Engine's Doubao TTS service, supporting multiple voices and languages, converts text into natural and fluent speech.

text.name: Text
text.tooltip: Text content to synthesize, supports multilingual mixed input. Maximum input is 10000 characters.

voice.name: Voice
voice.tooltip: Select the voice for speech synthesis, supporting various voices in different languages.

speed.name: Speed
speed.tooltip: Adjust speech playback speed, range -50-100, default value is 0.

pitch.name: Pitch
pitch.tooltip: Adjust speech pitch, range -12 to 12, default value is 0.

volume.name: Volume
volume.tooltip: Adjust speech volume, range -50-100, default value is 0.

emotion.name: Emotion
emotion.tooltip: Select speech emotion, affects the emotional expression of the voice.

sample_rate.name: Sample Rate
sample_rate.tooltip: Select audio sample rate, affects audio quality and file size.

channel.name: Channel
channel.tooltip: Select audio channel count, 1 for mono, 2 for stereo.

app_id.name: APP ID
app_id.tooltip: Doubao TTS service application ID. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

access_key.name: Access Token
access_key.tooltip: Doubao TTS service access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

DoubaoTTS_Mix.description: Doubao TTS Mix node based on Volcano Engine's Doubao TTS service, supporting mixing of multiple voices to create personalized audio.

text.name: Text
text.tooltip: Text content to synthesize, supports multilingual mixed input. Maximum input is 10000 characters.

voice_1.name: Voice 1
voice_1.tooltip: First voice for speech synthesis, supporting various voices in different languages.

mix_factor_1.name: Mix Factor 1
mix_factor_1.tooltip: Mixing factor for the first voice, range 0.0-1.0. The sum of all mixing factors must equal 1.0.

voice_2.name: Voice 2
voice_2.tooltip: Second voice for speech synthesis, supporting various voices in different languages.

mix_factor_2.name: Mix Factor 2
mix_factor_2.tooltip: Mixing factor for the second voice, range 0.0-1.0. The sum of all mixing factors must equal 1.0.

voice_3.name: Voice 3
voice_3.tooltip: Third voice for speech synthesis. Can be set to 'None' to use only two voices.

mix_factor_3.name: Mix Factor 3
mix_factor_3.tooltip: Mixing factor for the third voice, range 0.0-1.0. The sum of all mixing factors must equal 1.0.

speed.name: Speed
speed.tooltip: Adjust speech playback speed, range -50-100, default value is 0.

pitch.name: Pitch
pitch.tooltip: Adjust speech pitch, range -12 to 12, default value is 0.

sample_rate.name: Sample Rate
sample_rate.tooltip: Select audio sample rate, affects audio quality and file size.

channel.name: Channel
channel.tooltip: Select audio channel count, 1 for mono, 2 for stereo.

app_id.name: APP ID
app_id.tooltip: Doubao TTS service application ID. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

access_key.name: Access Token
access_key.tooltip: Doubao TTS service access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

ViduQ1Node.description: Vidu Q1 reference video node that generates videos using reference images and text descriptions, supporting various subjects such as characters and objects. Outputs video files instead of URLs.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, maximum length of 1500 characters.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

movement_amplitude.name: Movement Amplitude
movement_amplitude.tooltip: Movement amplitude of objects in the scene.

bgm.name: Background Music
bgm.tooltip: Whether to add background music to the generated video.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PioYun API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

image_1.name: Reference Image 1
image_1.tooltip: Reference image. The model will use the provided image as reference to generate a video with consistent subject.

image_2.name: Reference Image 2
image_2.tooltip: Reference image. The model will use the provided image as reference to generate a video with consistent subject.

image_3.name: Reference Image 3
image_3.tooltip: Reference image. The model will use the provided image as reference to generate a video with consistent subject.

image_4.name: Reference Image 4
image_4.tooltip: Reference image. The model will use the provided image as reference to generate a video with consistent subject.

image_5.name: Reference Image 5
image_5.tooltip: Reference image. The model will use the provided image as reference to generate a video with consistent subject.

image_6.name: Reference Image 6
image_6.tooltip: Reference image. The model will use the provided image as reference to generate a video with consistent subject.

image_7.name: Reference Image 7
image_7.tooltip: Reference image. The model will use the provided image as reference to generate a video with consistent subject.

ViduQ1StartEndNode.description: Vidu Q1 start-end frame video node that generates dynamic videos using start and end frames, incorporating creative storytelling and animation effects. Outputs video files instead of URLs.

start_image.name: Start Frame Image
start_image.tooltip: Start frame image, used as the starting frame for video generation.

end_image.name: End Frame Image
end_image.tooltip: End frame image, used as the ending frame for video generation.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, maximum length of 1500 characters.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

movement_amplitude.name: Movement Amplitude
movement_amplitude.tooltip: Movement amplitude of objects in the scene.

bgm.name: Background Music
bgm.tooltip: Whether to add background music to the generated video.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PioYun API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

ViduQ1Img2VideoNode.description: Vidu Q1 image-to-video node that converts static images into dynamic videos, incorporating creative storytelling and animation effects. Outputs video files instead of URLs.

image.name: Image
image.tooltip: Image used as the starting frame for video generation.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, maximum length of 1500 characters.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

movement_amplitude.name: Movement Amplitude
movement_amplitude.tooltip: Movement amplitude of objects in the scene.

bgm.name: Background Music
bgm.tooltip: Whether to add background music to the generated video.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PioYun API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

MinimaxHailuoPPIONode.description: Minimax Hailuo-02 video generation node, supporting both text-to-video and image-to-video generation.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, length range is 1-2000 characters.

duration.name: Duration
duration.tooltip: Duration of generated video (seconds), optional values are 6 or 10 seconds.

resolution.name: Resolution
resolution.tooltip: Resolution of generated video, 6-second videos support 768P and 1080P, 10-second videos only support 768P.

enable_prompt_expansion.name: Enable Prompt Expansion
enable_prompt_expansion.tooltip: Whether to enable prompt expansion feature.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

image.name: Start Frame Image
image.tooltip: Start frame image for video generation (optional).

end_image.name: End Frame Image
end_image.tooltip: End frame image for video generation (optional).

1.name: Task ID
1.tooltip: The ID of the generation task, which can be used to query task status.

MinimaxHailuo23PPIOImg2VideoNode.description: Minimax Hailuo 2.3 image-to-video node, supporting start and end frame image inputs with enhanced body movement, physics effects, and instruction understanding capabilities.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, length range is 1-2000 characters. Supports 15 camera movement instructions: horizontal movement [left][right], horizontal pan [pan left][pan right], push/pull [push in][pull out], vertical movement [up][down], vertical pan [tilt up][tilt down], zoom [zoom in][zoom out], others [shake][follow][fixed].

image.name: Start Frame Image
image.tooltip: Start frame image for video generation.

duration.name: Duration
duration.tooltip: Duration of generated video (seconds), optional values are 6 or 10 seconds.

resolution.name: Resolution
resolution.tooltip: Resolution of generated video, 6-second videos support 768P and 1080P, 10-second videos only support 768P.

enable_prompt_expansion.name: Enable Prompt Expansion
enable_prompt_expansion.tooltip: Whether to enable prompt expansion feature.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

end_image.name: End Frame Image
end_image.tooltip: End frame image for video generation (optional).

MinimaxHailuo23PPIOText2VideoNode.description: Minimax Hailuo 2.3 text-to-video node, pure text-based video generation with enhanced body movement, physics effects, and instruction understanding capabilities.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, length range is 1-2000 characters. Supports 15 camera movement instructions: horizontal movement [left][right], horizontal pan [pan left][pan right], push/pull [push in][pull out], vertical movement [up][down], vertical pan [tilt up][tilt down], zoom [zoom in][zoom out], others [shake][follow][fixed].

duration.name: Duration
duration.tooltip: Duration of generated video (seconds), optional values are 6 or 10 seconds.

resolution.name: Resolution
resolution.tooltip: Resolution of generated video, 6-second videos support 768P and 1080P, 10-second videos only support 768P.

enable_prompt_expansion.name: Enable Prompt Expansion
enable_prompt_expansion.tooltip: Whether to enable prompt expansion feature.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

MinimaxHailuo23FastPPIOImg2VideoNode.description: Minimax Hailuo 2.3 Fast image-to-video node, maintaining excellent image quality while significantly improving generation speed with higher cost-effectiveness.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, length range is 1-2000 characters.

image.name: Start Frame Image
image.tooltip: Start frame image for video generation.

duration.name: Duration
duration.tooltip: Duration of generated video (seconds), optional values are 6 or 10 seconds.

resolution.name: Resolution
resolution.tooltip: Resolution of generated video, 6-second videos support 768P and 1080P, 10-second videos only support 768P.

enable_prompt_expansion.name: Enable Prompt Expansion
enable_prompt_expansion.tooltip: Whether to enable prompt expansion feature.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

WanPPIOImg2VideoNode.description: Wan 2.5 Preview image-to-video node, supporting video generation from start frame images and text for 5 or 10 seconds, with new audio capabilities: automatic dubbing and custom audio file support.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, supports Chinese and English, maximum 2000 characters, excess will be automatically truncated.

image.name: Start Frame Image
image.tooltip: Start frame image for video generation.

duration.name: Duration
duration.tooltip: Duration of generated video (seconds), supported values: 5 or 10.

prompt_extend.name: Prompt Extension
prompt_extend.tooltip: Whether to enable intelligent prompt rewriting. When enabled, uses large model to intelligently rewrite input prompt, significantly improving generation effects for shorter prompts, but increases processing time.

watermark.name: Watermark
watermark.tooltip: Whether to add watermark identifier, watermark is located at the bottom right corner of the image with text 'AI Generated'.

audio.name: Audio
audio.tooltip: Whether to add audio. Parameter priority: audio_url > audio, only effective when audio_url is empty.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for controlling randomness of model generation, range: [0, 2147483647]. Will automatically generate random number if not filled.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

negative_prompt.name: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.tooltip: Negative prompt for describing content to avoid during video generation, can avoid or limit scenes. Supports Chinese and English, maximum 500 characters.

audio_url.name: Audio URL
audio_url.tooltip: Audio file URL for video generation. Audio requirements: Format: wav, mp3; Duration: 3-30 seconds; File size not exceeding 15MB.

WanPPIOText2VideoNode.description: Wan 2.5 Preview text-to-video node, supporting high-quality video content generation from text descriptions, can generate 5 or 10 second videos, with new audio capabilities: automatic dubbing and custom audio file support.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, supports Chinese and English, maximum 2000 characters, excess will be automatically truncated.

size.name: Size
size.tooltip: Supports 480P, 720P, 1080P resolutions. Size parameter specifies video output resolution in width*height format.

duration.name: Duration
duration.tooltip: Output video duration, optional values: 5 seconds, 10 seconds.

prompt_extend.name: Prompt Extension
prompt_extend.tooltip: Whether to enable intelligent prompt rewriting. When enabled, uses large model to automatically rewrite input prompt, improving generation effects for shorter prompts, but increases processing time.

watermark.name: Watermark
watermark.tooltip: Whether to add watermark identifier, watermark is located at the bottom right corner of the image with text 'AI Generated'.

audio.name: Audio
audio.tooltip: Whether to add audio. Parameter priority: audio_url > audio, only effective when audio_url is empty.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for controlling randomness of model generation content. Range: [0, 2147483647].

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

negative_prompt.name: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.tooltip: Negative prompt for describing content to avoid during video generation, can avoid or limit scenes. Supports Chinese and English, maximum 500 characters.

audio_url.name: Audio URL
audio_url.tooltip: Custom audio file URL for video generation. Audio requirements: Format: wav, mp3; Duration: 3~30 seconds; File size: not exceeding 15MB.

SeedancePPIOImg2VideoNode.description: Seedance image-to-video node that converts static images into dynamic videos, supporting both Lite and Pro versions. Outputs video files instead of URLs.

image.name: Image
image.tooltip: Image used as the starting frame for video generation.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, maximum length of 1500 characters.

model_version.name: Model Version
model_version.tooltip: Select the model version to use, Lite or Pro.

camera_fixed.name: Camera Fixed
camera_fixed.tooltip: Whether to keep the camera position fixed.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

last_image.name: Last Image
last_image.tooltip: End frame image, only supported by Lite version.

1.name: Task ID
1.tooltip: The ID of the generation task, which can be used to query task status.

SeedancePPIOText2VideoNode.description: Seedance text-to-video node that generates videos from text descriptions, supporting both Lite and Pro versions. Outputs video files instead of URLs.

prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, maximum length of 1500 characters.

model_version.name: Model Version
model_version.tooltip: Select the model version to use, Lite or Pro.

camera_fixed.name: Camera Fixed
camera_fixed.tooltip: Whether to keep the camera position fixed.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

1.name: Task ID
1.tooltip: The ID of the generation task, which can be used to query task status.

image.name: Image
image.tooltip: Image used as the starting frame for video generation.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, maximum length of 2048 characters.

fast_mode.name: Fast Mode
fast_mode.tooltip: Whether to enable fast mode, which will generate videos faster but may reduce quality.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

negative_prompt.name: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.tooltip: Negative prompt for generation, maximum length of 2048 characters.

PixVersePPIOText2VideoNode.description: PixVerse V4.5 text-to-video node that generates high-quality videos from text descriptions.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, maximum length of 2048 characters.

fast_mode.name: Fast Mode
fast_mode.tooltip: Whether to enable fast mode, which will generate videos faster but may reduce quality.

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

negative_prompt.name: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.tooltip: Negative prompt for generation, maximum length of 2048 characters.

model.name: Model

speed.name: Speed

emotion.name: Emotion

text_normalization.name: Text Normalization
text_normalization.tooltip: Whether to normalize text, such as conversion of numbers, dates, etc.

sample_rate.name: Sample Rate

bitrate.name: Bitrate
bitrate.tooltip: Select audio bitrate, only valid for MP3 format, affects audio quality and file size.

channel.tooltip: Select audio channel count, 1 for mono, 2 for stereo.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

voice_id.name: Voice ID
voice_id.tooltip: Voice ID input port. When connected, the 'Voice' selector selection will be ignored.

MiniMaxPPIOVoiceClone.description: MiniMax voice clone node, clones voice by uploading audio files, and optionally provides sample audio to enhance cloning effect.

clone_audio.name: Clone Audio
clone_audio.tooltip: Audio file to be cloned, supports mp3, m4a, wav formats, duration should be at least 10 seconds and no more than 5 minutes.

voice_id.name: Voice ID
voice_id.tooltip: Custom cloned voice ID, length 8-256, first character must be an English letter, allows numbers, letters, -, _, last character cannot be - or _.

prompt_audio.name: Prompt Audio
prompt_audio.tooltip: Optional sample audio file to enhance voice similarity and stability, supports mp3, m4a, wav formats, duration should be less than 8 seconds.

prompt_text.name: Prompt Text
prompt_text.tooltip: Text corresponding to the prompt audio, must match the audio content, and should end with punctuation.

test_text.name: Test Text
test_text.tooltip: Voice cloning test parameter, the model will read this text using the cloned voice.

model.name: Model
model.tooltip: Specify the speech model used to synthesize the test audio.

need_noise_reduction.name: Noise Reduction
need_noise_reduction.tooltip: Voice cloning parameter, whether to enable noise reduction.

need_volume_normalization.name: Volume Normalization
need_volume_normalization.tooltip: Voice cloning parameter, whether to enable volume normalization.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

0.name: Demo Audio
0.tooltip: Test audio synthesized using the cloned voice.

PPIOQueryTaskResultNode.description: PPIO query task result node, used to query the execution result of asynchronous tasks.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

0.name: Response Content
0.tooltip: The raw JSON string of the task query result.

1.name: Video URL
1.tooltip: The extracted video URL from the response, empty if no video is available.

KlingPPIOImg2VideoNode.description: Kling 2.5 Turbo image-to-video node that converts static images into dynamic videos, supporting professional mode.

image.name: Image
image.tooltip: The image to use as the starting frame for video generation.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Text prompt for video generation, maximum length of 2500 characters.

duration.name: Duration
duration.tooltip: Duration of the generated video (seconds), optional values are 5 seconds or 10 seconds.

cfg_scale.name: CFG Scale
cfg_scale.tooltip: Controls the flexibility of video generation. Higher values make the generated content more closely match the prompt but reduce creative freedom. Range: 0 to 1

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

negative_prompt.name: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.tooltip: Negative prompt to avoid unwanted content; length not exceeding 2500 characters.

KlingPPIOText2VideoNode.description: Kling 2.5 Turbo text-to-video node that generates high-quality videos from text descriptions, supporting professional mode.

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.tooltip: Positive text prompt guiding the generation. Length not exceeding 2500 characters.

duration.name: Duration
duration.tooltip: Duration of the generated video (seconds), optional values are 5 seconds or 10 seconds.

cfg_scale.name: CFG Scale
cfg_scale.tooltip: Controls the flexibility of video generation. Higher values make the generated content more closely match the prompt but reduce creative freedom. Range: 0 to 1

seed.name: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Random seed for video generation. Set to -1 for random generation.

api_key.name: API Key
api_key.tooltip: PPIO API access key. If not provided, will use the key from config file.

negative_prompt.name: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.tooltip: Negative prompt to avoid unwanted content; length not exceeding 2500 characters.
